<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete an existing rule</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/api/v2/security_monitoring/rules/{rule_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>


Delete an existing rule. Default rules cannot be deleted.
## Request
